p: The protocols for human and monkey studies were approved by the National Ethics Committee of Senegal and the University of Texas Medical Branch Institutional Review Board and Animal Care and Use Committees, respectively. The protocol used for animals adheres to the Senegal national guideline and approved by the Institutional Review Board of the Interstate School for science and veterinary medicine. Written informed consent for adults and children was obtained. Concerning children, sera were collected with the consent of the parents. An audit of the protocol implementation was regularly conducted by the authorities of the National Ethics Committee of Senegal.
